{{Actor | image = | name = Noel Appleby | lifetime = [[5 April]] [[1933]] - [[17 May]] [[2007]] | played = [[Everard Proudfoot]] | film = ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' | imdb = [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0032370/ Profile] }} '''Noel Appleby''' was a New Zealand actor. He played [[Everard Proudfoot]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''. In [[2007]], he and 14 other actors filed [https://us.imdb.com/news/ni0058227/ a lawsuit] against [[New Line Cinema]] over merchandising royalties,{{webcite|author=MrCere|articleurl=https://www.theonering.net/torwp/2007/06/01/23983-actors-join-to-sue-new-line-over-lotr-merchandising/|articlename=Actors join to sue New Line over LOTR merchandising|dated=1 June 2007|website=TORN|accessed=3 December 2024}} but he died before the court made its decision. {{References}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Appleby, Noel}} [[Category:Actors and actresses]] [[Category:New Zealand people]] [[Category:People by name]] [[Category:The Lord of the Rings (film series) cast]] [[de:Noel Appleby]]
